ComicInfo.Summary:
The origin of the zombie outbreak is revealed! Alliances are tested! Roads are traveled! KISS and crew make their way to the source of the signal in search of hope, but what they encounter could be their biggest threat yet. And that is saying a lot...what with the zombies and all.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Arthur Suydam | 1 | B | Cover B | Stuart Sayger | 2 | C | Cover C | Rodney Buchemi (a) & Dijjo Lima (c) | 3 | D | Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Photo" Edition Variant Cover | Photo | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi (a) & Dijjo Lima (c) | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 7 | H/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Arthur Suydam | 8 | I/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 9 | J/FOC | FOC Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Ken Haeser (a) & Blair Smith (c) | 10 | K/FOC | 1:7 FOC Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Ken Haeser | 11 | L/FOC | 1:11 FOC Retailer Incentive "Pure Pencil" Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 12 | M/FOC | 1:15 FOC Retailer Incentive "Black & White Virgin" Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 13 | N/FOC | 1:21 FOC Retailer Incentive "Tinted Virgin" Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 14 |
